articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi's records have been smashed by Harry Kane, who was England's hero yet again after scoring a late equaliser against Germany in the Nations League
articles.content:
Harry Kane scored a late goal against Germany to earn England a 1-1 draw, and in doing so beat both Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi to a prestigious record.
Kane's goal from the penalty spot was … [+3024 chars]
